resources:
Copyright \u00a9 2018 Dylan Trebilcock It is also why your feedback means a lot to us and helps make the app better. If you have any concerns or ideas for improvement, please email us at d.trebilcock@charter.net We have simple mission: To make your everyday life easier. There are a lot of amazing ways software development can make your life easier. From automating task so you can focus on other things, to combining and organizing data for you to get the bottom line details you need when you need them. The possibilities are truly endless. However, companies often focus on trying to create the next big thing rather than simple things that are worth much more. Take CarUpkeep for example. The entire idea is to track your car for you, so you can worry about one less thing. CarUpkeep notifies you when your vehicle is needing maintenance and it is the right maintenance for your specific vehicle per the vehicle manufacturer. You can have some piece of mind knowing you vehicle has the love it needs and you will not get sold maintenance you do not need. All so you can continue your adventure with one less worry. That thought keeps motivated to make this thing better. Average daily miles Current miles Vehicle Name Add a Vehicle CarUpkeep Date Required Maintenance Miles Vehicle Name Change oil (Be sure to get Synthetic Oil!), Replace Oil filter, and Rotate tires Replace Key Fob battery and Wiper Blades, Rotate Tires, and Perform a Multi-Point Inspection and Wheel Alignment Replace A/C desiccant bag, Brake Fluid, and Cabin Air Filter Replace Battery Coolant Congratulations on 100,000 miles! Keep up the good work! Miles Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer No Vehicle Added No Vehicles added Save UpcomingActivity HistoryActivity Vehicle Name Miles Date Required Maintenance
